features: POWERFULLY CLEAN, PLUS LONG-LASTING FRESHNESS. This concentrated wash detergent gives you the deep cleaning power of our trusted laundry detergent in a single Power Pak that’s formulated to help get out tough dirt and odors with lasting freshness. Even better is the convenience this laundry wash detergent delivers in a no-mess, pre-measured unit dose form you just drop in on wash day.

5 POWERFUL CLEANING BENEFITS. This concentrated laundry detergent in a convenient, pre-measured unit dose form delivers deep cleaning 5-in-1 power as laundry detergent Power Paks that offer long-lasting freshness for days, combat odors, fight stains, brighten colors, and invigorate with an active scent boost.

NO MEASURING, MESS OR SPILLS. For the novice washer in your home, the back of the packaging lays out step-by-step directions for proper usage. Additionally, these convenient pre-measured Power Paks combine ultra-concentrated laundry detergent in a drop-and-go laundry Power Pak. Instead of inconvenient measuring like with traditional laundry detergent, simply drop in one Power Pak for regular or lightly soiled loads, or two Power Paks for large and heavily soiled loads.

WORKS IN ALL MACHINES AND ALL TEMPERATURES. This ultra-concentrated and ultra-convenient laundry detergent in pre-measured Power Paks works in standard and High Efficiency (HE) washing machines. It’s a laundry detergent that dissolves in all water temperatures, including cold water. Use these HE laundry detergent Power Paks for a deep clean and fresh fragrance.

ENVIRONMENTALLY-CONSCIOUS MANUFACTURING METHODS AND PACKAGING. We’re making a promise to you and Mother Earth. Our all-liquid formula is made with 100% renewable electricity. The Clean Burst 5-in-1 pouch is recyclable via Terracycle, and in partnership with the Arbor Day Foundation we help plant millions of trees. This product is NOT tested on animals.
body.description: Concentrated laundry detergent that provides a powerful clean and a long-lasting burst of freshness in a convenient, pre-measured unit dose form is what you get each time you wash a load with ARM & HAMMER 5-in-1 Clean Burst Power Paks. With no mess, measuring or spills, this concentrated detergent in a convenient Power Pak form works in both standard and High Efficiency (HE) washing machines to combine deep-cleaning detergent with ARM& HAMMER freshness. Our 5-in-1 Power Paks provide freshness for days, contain an active scent boost, whiten whites, brighten colors and attack odors to ensure a powerful clean. The ALL-LIQUID formulation attacks odors and blasts away tough dirt and set-in stains for a powerful, efficient, and long-lasting clean. Get ultra-concentrated cleaning power in this convenient pre-measured dose of laundry detergent designed to work in all temperatures, including cold water, and all machines. Drop one in today!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Arm & Hammer Clean Burst Power Paks - A Burst of Laundry Brilliance
reviews.reviewText: Embark on a laundry revolution with Arm & Hammer Clean Burst 5-in-1 Laundry Detergent Power Paks, a powerhouse of cleanliness that transforms your laundry routine into a symphony of efficiency and freshness. This isn't just a laundry detergent; it's a burst of brilliance encapsulated in a convenient Pak form, making laundry day a breeze with its High Efficiency (HE) formula and a count of 42 Paks.The Clean Burst Fragrance is a sensory delight. Arm & Hammer understands that the essence of cleanliness extends beyond just appearance, and the clean burst fragrance ensures that your clothes emerge from the wash not only impeccably clean but also infused with a burst of invigorating freshness. It's not just a detergent; it's a fragrance symphony that lingers on your fabrics, turning every load into a revitalizing experience.The 5-in-1 Cleaning Power is a game-changer in laundry technology. Arm & Hammer goes beyond conventional detergents by incorporating the power of five essential elements in each Pak—cleaning, stain-fighting, brightening, softening, and a burst of fragrance. It's not just a detergent; it's a comprehensive cleaning orchestra that addresses every aspect of your laundry needs, ensuring that your clothes emerge not just clean but revitalized.The Power Pak Convenience is a time-saving marvel. Arm & Hammer recognizes that efficiency is key in today's fast-paced world, and the pre-measured Paks eliminate the hassle of measuring detergent, making laundry day a streamlined and efficient process. It's not just a detergent; it's a time-conscious companion that respects your schedule and simplifies your laundry routine.The High Efficiency (HE) Formula is a nod to modern laundry machines. Arm & Hammer understands the importance of compatibility, and the HE formula ensures optimal performance in high-efficiency washing machines. It's not just a detergent; it's a technological ally that caters to the needs of contemporary laundry appliances, delivering stellar results with every wash.The Count of 42 Paks offers extended convenience. Arm & Hammer doesn't just provide a mere supply; it presents a robust count of 42 Paks, ensuring that you're well-equipped for weeks of laundry without the need for frequent restocking. It's not just a detergent; it's a generous provision that anticipates your laundry needs and provides a continuous burst of cleaning power.The Easy-to-Use Design ensures a hassle-free laundry experience. Arm & Hammer ensures that everyone, from laundry aficionados to novices, can benefit from the Clean Burst Power Paks with their user-friendly design. It's not just a detergent; it's an accessible cleaning solution that invites everyone to experience the convenience and brilliance of Arm & Hammer.In conclusion, the Arm & Hammer Clean Burst 5-in-1 Laundry Detergent Power Paks are not just detergent Paks; they're a burst of brilliance, a symphony of cleaning power that revolutionizes your laundry experience. With their clean burst fragrance, 5-in-1 cleaning prowess, and convenient Pak form, Arm & Hammer invites you to elevate your laundry routine. Embrace the burst of brilliance—where every Pak is a step towards immaculate freshness and efficiency!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Cleans clothes well and it’s a good value for the cost

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for price
reviews.reviewText: Personally I always use about 3/4 pods in each load. I really like my laundry to be clean, and I only use these pods on the towels and blankets that my dogs use, as a cheaper alternative to the more expensive detergent I use on my clothes. Throw 3/4 of these in with the dogs bath towels, and their blankets, or my couch cushion covers, they come out clean and smelling fresh :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does a good job, convenient
reviews.reviewText: Good cleaning power, very convenient, reliable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells so good, Fresh and not too perfumey
reviews.reviewText: I've tried all of the Arm and Hammer pods, and this is my favorite. The smell is so nice, and not overpowering. The combo of ingredients helps remove certain stains and weird smells. They recommend using 2 with big loads, but one seems to be enough with my washer. Very happy with these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great laundry detergent
reviews.reviewText: I love this laundry detergent. Have been using for many years. The price is really good compared to other brands and works just as well or better. I have been using baking soda instead of bleach on my whites for so long, and like it much better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great value for the money. Not a really strong scent (I'm a non-smoker) & I equate that with freshness however the clothes feel clean after washing. Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected.
reviews.reviewText: I accidentally had to stop my washer to add an item inside. I was so surprised at all the sudsy liquid on my clothes for one packet. If my clothes are super heavy I use two. One will really clean a normal wash. I have really weak wrist and the sachets are so clean & easy to use.
